name: unabsorbed
content:
unabsorbed adjective
(NOT TAKEN IN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having been taken into something: Drain off any unabsorbed liquid before serving. Seeds are often unabsorbed by the body's digestive system.
More examplesFewer examplesPollution can remain unabsorbed in the natural world for a long time.Unabsorbed fluids will naturally sink downwards.She used dry bread to soak up the unabsorbed liquid.There was still some unabsorbed liquid at the bottom of the tube.

unabsorbed adjective
(NOT INTERESTED)
not very interested in something: She remains unabsorbed by the world of fashion. He seemed to be quite unabsorbed in his task. Related word
absorb
